Projects

This page lists the ongoing and past research projects of RPAL. Project pages are meant to be used as a central location for storing and organizing detailed project information (data, reports, findings, papers and preprints, etc.) and resources (useful links, relevant papers, etc.). Please be sure to regularly maintain your project details on the wiki!

Current Projects

  • Social Navigation
  • Skynet Jr.
  • Roboblimp
  • The Scrabble Thing
  • IkeaBot

Past Projects
